scripts.start: pm2 flush && pm2 start main.js --name neo --node-args="-r esm -r dotenv/config" && pm2 logs neo
scripts.stop: pm2 stop neo && pm2 delete neo
scripts.restart: yarn stop && pm2 flush && yarn start
scripts.release:git: github-release release --user bitslercasino --repo neo-wallet --tag v1.3.0 --name "v1.3.0" --description "stable neo wallet release v1.3.0"
scripts.release:upload: github-release upload --user bitslercasino  --repo neo-wallet --tag v1.3.0 --name "bitsler_neo.sh" --file bitsler_neo.sh
scripts.build:release: docker build --no-cache -t unibtc/neo:latest -t unibtc/neo:1.3.0 . && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push && yarn release:now && docker push unibtc/neo:latest && docker push unibtc/neo:1.3.0
